title: Just curious
body: Random drop rate ayy ? 70+ games not 1 key fragment

replies.body: The drop rate decreases each time you earn a fragment and resets each month (the reset being from the date you earned your first fragment, rather than a particular date). It's a gating mechanic to stop people from earning vastly higher numbers of keys than chests to go with them. What this means is that players who play a lot of games (like it sounds like you do) will go very long periods without earning any fragments towards the end of their month. You ought to notice straight away when your month resets, because you'll be seeing them much more often.
Ty, thought so, but it still dont drop enough to keep up with boxes.

It's because while you can (theoretically) earn infinite keys, there is a finite number of boxes you can earn in a season, so for most players, early season will see more boxes than keys, but later more keys than boxes. It generally sorts itself out over time.
